title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Analysis of Pre-Service Teachers' Disciplinary Experiences and Reproduction Mechanisms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of secondary education curriculum and basic classroom management theories
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can classify experienced disciplinary methods into four mechanisms (surveillance, classification, evaluation, initiation) and provide illustrative examples
Symbolic violence elements in disciplinary processes can be identified through VR simulation analysis
Alternative disciplinary strategies considering cultural contexts can be designed and their applicability evaluated in simulation environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
